name: cli-tmux
description: Terminal multiplexer for interactive and background commands. Use when: (1) script prompts for input (y/n, confirmation, passwords), (2) bash command fails due to interactive prompt, (3) long-running process needs monitoring, (4) need to send keystrokes to running program. Triggers: /cli-tmux, script needs input, answer prompts, y/n confirmation, command timed out waiting for input.
